agents.name: code_analyst
agents.goal: Analyze the CloudCurio codebase to understand its structure, components, and functionality
agents.backstory: You are an expert software engineer with extensive experience in code analysis. Your task is to examine the codebase in detail, identifying key components, understanding how they interact, and documenting the overall architecture.

agents.name: documentation_specialist
agents.goal: Create comprehensive documentation based on the codebase analysis
agents.backstory: You are a technical writer with deep expertise in creating developer documentation. Your task is to transform the code analysis into clear, comprehensive documentation and standard operating procedures.

agents.name: qa_engineer
agents.goal: Review the generated documentation for accuracy and completeness
agents.backstory: You are a quality assurance engineer with experience in both code review and technical documentation. Your task is to ensure that all generated documentation accurately reflects the codebase.

tasks.name: code_analysis_task
tasks.description: Analyze the CloudCurio codebase to understand its structure and components.
tasks.expected_output: A comprehensive analysis of the CloudCurio codebase structure and components.

tasks.name: documentation_task
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation based on the code analysis.
tasks.expected_output: Comprehensive documentation files covering all aspects of the CloudCurio platform.

tasks.name: qa_review_task
tasks.description: Review the generated documentation for accuracy and completeness.
tasks.expected_output: A review of the documentation with feedback on accuracy and completeness.
